author: sarafiorendi
body:
This PR is updating the code for muon validation to read Stage2 L1 objects.
It is also updating the list of paths monitored by the muon offline HLT DQM by adding HLT_Iso(Tk)Mu22_eta2p1 and removing HLT_OldIso(Tk)18 paths.
Few changes have been included in the muon RelVal DQM to remove the old isolation monitoring.
title: update muon validation plots to Stage2L1 + update HLT DQM plots
